mod.name: command-monsterinfo
mod.author: slawkens
mod.talkaction:
function onSay(cid, words, param, channel) if(errors ~= nil) then errors(false) end local monster = getMonsterInfo(param) if(not monster) then doPlayerSendTextMessage(cid, MESSAGE_STATUS_CONSOLE_BLUE, "Monster with this name does not exist.") if(errors ~= nil) then errors(true) end return true end
if(errors ~= nil) then errors(true) end
local tmp = "" local header = "Monster info: " .. monster.name .. "

" local str = header .. "Health: " .. monster.health if(monster.health ~= monster.healthMax) then str = str .. "/" .. monster.healthMax end
str = str .. "
 Experience: " .. getExperienceStage(getPlayerLevel(cid)) * monster.experience if(monster.manaCost ~= 0) then str = str .. "
 ManaCost: " .. monster.manaCost end
if(not monster.attacks) then monster.attacks = getMonsterAttackSpells(param) end
local i = 0 tmp = "" for _, spell in pairs(monster.attacks) do if(spell.minCombatValue ~= 0) then tmp = tmp .. "*Min: " .. spell.minCombatValue .. " Max: " .. spell.maxCombatValue .. "
" i = i + 1 end end if(i > 0) then str = str .. "

Attack spells:
" .. tmp end
if(not monster.summons) then monster.summons = getMonsterSummonList(param) end
tmp = "" i = 0 if #monster.summons > 0 then for _, summon in pairs(monster.summons) do tmp = tmp .. summon.name .. " (Max: " .. summon.amount .. ")
" i = i + 1 end end if(i > 0) then str = str .. "

Summons:
" .. tmp end
if(str:len() > 1000) then doPlayerPopupFYI(cid, str) str = "" end
if(not monster.loot) then monster.loot = getMonsterLootList(param) end
str = header .. "Loot:
" for _, item in pairs(monster.loot) do str = str .. getItemNameById(item.id) .. " (Max: " .. (item.countMax and item.countMax or item.count) .. ")
" end
doPlayerPopupFYI(cid, str) return true end
